original_text: “‘Every day you are to provide a year-old lamb without defect for a burnt offering to the Lord; morning by morning you shall provide it.
korean_text: 아침마다 일년 되고 흠 없는 어린 양 한 마리를 번제를 갖추어 나 여호와께 드리고

sentences.original_text: Every day you are to provide a year-old lamb
sentences.korean_translation: 매일 당신은 일년된 어린 양을 바쳐야 합니다

sentences.original_text: without defect for a burnt offering to the Lord
morning by morning you shall provide it
